data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Sonitpur, Assam, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 124,317 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sonitpur, Assam, India

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Sonitpur, Assam, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 125,700 people living in the county of Sonitpur.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Sonitpur, Assam, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Aka people.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 125,700 citizens of the the county of Sonitpur.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,383 believers in Sonitpur to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sonitpur, Assam, India has a population of 125,700.

We estimate Sonitpur has 1,383 people who might know Jesus, 1,525 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 122,792 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: There are 125,700 people living in the county of Sonitpur. Only about 1,383 might be believers.
